appNeedsUpdate: You're using an older version of the app. Please update to the latest version.
loginAuthenticationError: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
legalStuff: By using this software you agree to our {{privacyPolicy}} and {{termsOfUse}}.
searchCommunityHint: Find your community by entering its name and press the search button
joinRequestSubmitted: Your request has been submitted. When it is processed, we will get notification on your device.
joinCommunityReminderMessage: You are not a member of any community yet. Please join a community to get started.
profilePictureRequired: Please set your profile picture. This will help other users identify you easily in the system.
productSlogan: making communities smarter, bringing people closer

walkthrough.walkthrough1Text: To get started, please register with your profile picture, phone number & password. After you register, you can join your community.

signUpPage.pinHint: Enter your telephone number and we'll send you an OTP by SMS. You can use this code to complete the registration.
signUpPage.pinSentConfirmationMessage: We have sent you an OTP by SMS. You should get it within the next minute or so.
signUpPage.requestNewSecurityCodeMessage: SMS messages sometimes take a few minutes to arrive. Would you like to wait for some more time or request a new OTP?

resetPasswordPage.pinHint: Enter the telephone number that you used to register and we'll send you an OTP by SMS. You can use this to reset your password.

notification_friend_request: {{name}} has sent you a friend request.
join_community_invitation: {{ sender }} has invited you to join {{community}}.
joinCommunitySuccess: Congratulations! You are now a member of {{community}}.
invitationAccepted: You accepted this invitation on {{ date }}
invitationRejected: You rejected this invitation on {{ date }}
name: Name
autoStartPermissionModalMessage:
To maximise the battery life, your device does not allow new apps from auto-starting when receiving live messages. Consequently, QQDEN cannot auto-start to show live notifications for community events.

To fix this, please give QQDEN auto-start permission from device's Auto-Start Manager settings.

Would you like to open the relevant settings for this?
objectNotFound: The requested item was not found.
permissionDenied: You do not have the necessary privileges.
serverInternalError: We're sorry - something went wrong at our servers. We'll look into it as soon as possible.
unknownError: We're sorry - something unexpected happened. Please try again after some time.
complaintPublicHint: Public {{complaint}} will be visible to everyone in the community.
parcelReceiptDefaultMessage: You have a new parcel at {{community}}.
issueCategoriesNotSetup: Complaint categories not defined. Categories need to be setup before complaints can be created.
logoutPrompt:
If you logout, you will not receive notifications on important events.
Are you sure you want to continue?
enterPINPrompt: Please enter the OTP that we sent to your phone.
attachmentTooLarge: Attachment is too large. Attachments have to be less than {{maxSize}}.
maximumAttachmentsReached: You have reached maximum number of {{attachments}}.

formValidationErrorMessages.minlength: Does not meeting the minimum length requirements
formValidationErrorMessages.memberAlreadyExists: A user matching this email/telephone is already a member of this community.
formValidationErrorMessages.invitationAlreadyExists: An active invitation matching this email/telephone already exists.
formValidationErrorMessages.unitAlreadyExists: A unit with this name already exists.
formValidationErrorMessages.blockAlreadyExists: A block with this name already exists
formValidationErrorMessages.incorrectOldPassword: Incorrect old password. Please enter it again.
formValidationErrorMessages.invalidPassword: At least 8 characters and consist of letters & numbers.
formValidationErrorMessages.invalidNewPassword: At least 8 characters and consist of letters & numbers.
formValidationErrorMessages.joinCommunityIsMember: You are already a member of this community.
formValidationErrorMessages.joinCommunityRequestPending: You previous request to join this community is still pending.
formValidationErrorMessages.unitAlreadyHasOwner: Unit already has an owner defined.
formValidationErrorMessages.categoryAlreadyExists: A category with this name already exists.
formValidationErrorMessages.accountNotFound: An account matching this number was not found.
formValidationErrorMessages.userAlreadyExists: An account matching this number already exists.
